s.text: As you may already be aware of by reading the IUSD Newsletter, your fellow classmate and friend, Dr. Harvey G. Levinson passed away in 1986.

As you may already be aware of by reading the IUSD Newsletter, your fellow classmate and friend, Dr. Harvey G. Levinson passed away in 1986.
In that same year, his family, friends and colleagues established a memorial scholarship at Indiana University School of Dentistry.
